sentences.en: ‘We haven't any decaf, I'm afraid.’ ‘No sweat.’.
sentences.cn: “恐怕我们没有脱咖啡因的咖啡了。”“不用担心。”。

sentences.en: “keep what they produced by the sweat of their brow”(&b{Mario Puzo})
sentences.cn: “通过辛勤的工作来保住他们的所得”(&b{马里奥·普佐})

sentences.en: about 1,500 runners are expected to sweat it out in this year's run.
sentences.cn: 预计大约会有1,500名赛跑者将在今年的比赛中艰苦拼搏。

sentences.en: Beads of sweat appeared on his forehead.
sentences.cn: 他的额头上冒出了汗珠。

sentences.en: Both horse and rider were dripping with sweat within five minutes.
sentences.cn: 没过五分钟，马和骑手都大汗淋漓。

sentences.en: Cool down very gradually after working up a sweat.
sentences.cn: 大量出汗后要慢慢降温。

sentences.en: Darcy's face was white and glistening with sweat.
sentences.cn: 达西脸色苍白，汗珠晶莹。

sentences.en: Do you sweat a lot or flush a lot?
sentences.cn: 你常出汗或是脸上常发烫吗？

sentences.en: Every morning I would break out in a sweat.
sentences.cn: 每天早上我都会出一身汗。

sentences.en: He awoke from his sleep in a cold sweat.
sentences.cn: 他从睡梦中醒来，浑身冒着冷汗。

sentences.en: He wiped away the beads of sweat on his forehead.
sentences.cn: 他擦去了额头上的汗珠。

sentences.en: He wiped the sweat off his face and looked around.
sentences.cn: 他擦了擦脸上的汗水并四处张望。

sentences.en: Her short spiky hair is damp with sweat.
sentences.cn: 她的刺头被汗打湿了。

sentences.en: I was sweating a lot despite the air conditioning.
sentences.cn: 尽管开着空调，我仍是满头大汗。

sentences.en: Ian came off the squash court dripping with sweat .
sentences.cn: 伊恩大汗淋漓地离开壁球场。

sentences.en: My shirt was clammy with sweat.
sentences.cn: 我的衬衫汗涔涔的。

sentences.en: She looked up at me with pinpricks of sweat along her hairline.
sentences.cn: 她抬头看了我一眼，发际渗出细密的汗珠。

sentences.en: she's sweated blood to support her family.
sentences.cn: 她为了养家拼命工作。

sentences.en: sweat out an examination.
sentences.cn: 焦急地忍受考试

sentences.en: sweat out one's final grades.
sentences.cn: 焦急地等待最后的分数

sentences.en: Sweat poured down his face.
sentences.cn: 他满头大汗。

sentences.en: Sweat ran from his forehead into his eyes, blurring his vision.
sentences.cn: 汗水从额头流到了眼睛里，模糊了他的视线。

sentences.en: The sweat glands secrete water.
sentences.cn: 汗腺分泌汗液。

sentences.en: The very thought brought me out in a cold sweat.
sentences.cn: 一想到这我就一身冷汗。

sentences.en: You can really work up a sweat doing housework.
sentences.cn: 做家务真的会让人大汗淋漓。

words.tran_cn: 出汗的；吃力的；使人出汗的
毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂
出汗；辛苦工作；懊恼；结水珠
使出汗；流出；使干苦活；剥削；藉出汗减轻；焦急地期待

phrases.phrase: by the sweat of one's brow
phrases.tran_cn: 靠自己辛苦劳动（多指体力劳动）
(非正式)一点都不困难；不必担心
(北美，非正式)非常焦虑（或担心）
(非正式)忍受（痛苦的经历，多指在炎热的环境中进行的重体力劳动）

trans.tran_en: drops of salty liquid that come out through your skin when you are hot, frightened, ill, or doing exercise

trans.tran_cn: 出汗，苦干，焦虑，渗出水分，用文火熬
trans.tran_en: to have drops of salty liquid coming out through your skin because you are hot, ill, frightened, or doing exercise
